dt: {bc}a representation of the astrological aspects of the planets at a particular time

pt: {sc}plan{/sc} {sc}design{/sc} {sc}plot{/sc} {sc}scheme{/sc} {sc}project{/sc} mean a method devised for making or doing something or achieving an end. {sc}plan{/sc} always implies mental formulation and sometimes graphic representation.
{sc}design{/sc} often suggests a particular pattern and some degree of achieved order or harmony.
{sc}plot{/sc} implies a laying out in clearly distinguished sections with attention to their relations and proportions.
{sc}scheme{/sc} stresses calculation of the end in view and may apply to a plan motivated by craftiness and self-interest.
{sc}project{/sc} often stresses imaginative scope and vision.

et: Latin {it}schemat-, schema{/it} arrangement, figure, from Greek {it}schēmat-, schēma{/it}, from {it}echein{/it} to have, hold, be in (such) a condition; akin to Old English {it}sige{/it} victory, Sanskrit {it}sahate{/it} he prevails
shortdef: a plan or program of action; especially : a crafty or secret one
a systematic or organized configuration : design
a concise statement or table : epitome
to form plans; also : plot, intrigue

dt: {bc}an investment swindle in which some early investors are paid off with money put up by later ones in order to encourage more and bigger risks

shortdef: an investment swindle in which some early investors are paid off with money put up by later ones in order to encourage more and bigger risks

dt: {bc}a usually illegal operation in which participants pay to join and profit mainly from payments made by subsequent participants

shortdef: a usually illegal operation in which participants pay to join and profit mainly from payments made by subsequent participants

dt: {bc}the arrangement of rhymes in a stanza or a poem

shortdef: the arrangement of rhymes in a stanza or a poem
